meanings.definition: The condition of having stones in the urinary tract.
meanings.sent1: Urolithiasis can cause severe pain in the lower abdomen.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with urolithiasis after an X-ray.
meanings.sent3: When the cat had urolithiasis, it meowed in discomfort.
meanings.sent4: The burden of urolithiasis weighed heavily on the patient's mind.
meanings.sent5: The image of urolithiasis in the urinary tract was etched in the doctor's memory.

meanings.definition: The formation of calculi in the urinary system.
meanings.sent1: Preventing urolithiasis involves drinking plenty of water.
meanings.sent2: The surgery aimed to remove the urolithiasis from the bladder.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected guest at the party was like urolithiasis - causing a stir.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to overcome urolithiasis was as strong as a rock.
meanings.sent5: The sound of urolithiasis clinking in the urinary system was unsettling.
